data.message:
Everyone seeing Eminem attack rich people who don't deserve it in his raps, no one seeing him help poor people who need it most. This fucking world is a joke and Eminem hits it with his best punchline (that pun though)
(That double entendre though)
I'll be donating this Friday for sure.

replies.message: You Hit That On The Head Bro, He Does A lot Here In The Detroit Area Far As Giving Back To Our Community
You don't know what he does outside of rap. Sit yo ugly ass down
Who's helping the poor. Approximately how many million followers? Just 1/4 of that 1-10 dollars? How much did the followers help the poor?

Let's all hope we get luck (us rap artists) get hitched wit big guy- Dre- make millions with a crew working our image, get big, youngsters emulate, UR name gets big, everyone wants to attach themselves to UR name for publicity and getting a voice, then soon later, just list a fundraiser, U got the national, international power to voice to the mass, everyone else silenced, and collect donations from the fans.
I don't quite understand your point Holly
